articles.description: Since May this year, the Reserve Bank of India (RBI) has hiked the repo rates 4 times. which in turn has made fixed deposits (FDs) interest rates more attractive
articles.content: Unity Small Finance Bank Limited (Unity Bank), a new age, digital first bank, has launched Shagun 501, a special Fixed Deposit tenure to brighten up Dussehra and Diwali. For a 501 days fixed deposit,… [+2037 chars]
